General.Name: Pragma Inkaso S.A.
General.Description: Pragma Inkaso S.A. provides debt collection and business financing services in Poland. It provides financing for entrepreneurs in the form of factoring and loans. The company also engages in the taking over and restructuring the debt and valuation of mortgage securities, as well as acquires and services corporate, SME, and mortgage portfolios and receivables. In addition, it leases real estate properties and offers other financial services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tarnowskie Góry, Poland.
